WORK EXPERIENCE

IT Program Manager

improvement, 95% test cycle time reduction and 100% DevOps enablement
 
●

GenRocket
 
●

including  Information  Technology  (IT),  Finance  &    Operations  (F&O),  and  Human Resources  (HR), 
improving operational efficiency by   85% YoY.
